definitions.body: living human body Ge 47:18 (sg., of many persons), cf. pl. Ne 9:37; of man in Daniel's vision Da 10:6 (body apart from extremities); also of the living creatures in Ezek.'s vision Ez Eze 1:11, Eze 1:28.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of man 1Sa 31:10 (so orig. in ‖ 1Ch 10:10 v. We:Sm cf. Dr) v:1Ch 10:12, v:1Ch 10:12 (sg. of several persons), Ps 110:6; coll. Na 3:3, Na 3:3;
